name: Don't Steal the Stealer
description:
You’re a great thief, with an amazing career, but one day someone stole all your stuff. Now you want your revenge and show that you can’t steal to a stealer. Choose which heist to do, and steal everything you can take, because you need money to find clues about who robbed you and to buy gadgets, that will help you to complete more and more difficult heists. But remember, you have only one rule: don’t get caught!

Don’t Steal The Stealer is a 2D stealth game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
